content: कामुक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (का|की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [कम्-उकञ्] {@--1@} Wishing, desirous. {@--2@} Lustful, libidinous. --कः {@--1@} A lover, a libidinous man; कामुकैः कुंभीलकैश्च परिहर्तव्या चंद्रिका <ls>M. 4</ls>; <ls>R. 19. 33</ls>; <ls>Rs. 6. 9.</ls> {@--2@} A sparrow. {@--3@} The Aśoka tree. --का A woman desirous of wealth. --की A libidinous or lustful woman.
